original_text: And when he entered the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came up to him as he was teaching, and said, “By what authority are you doing these things, and who gave you this authority?”
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에 들어가 가르치실새 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들이 나아와 이르되 네가 무슨 권위로 이런 일을 하느냐 또 누가 이 권위를 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: And when he entered the temple,
the chief priests and the elders of the people
came up to him as he was teaching,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가르치고 계실 때 그에게 다가와

sentences.original_text: “By what authority are you doing these things,
and who gave you this authority?”
